name: Treasure Tile (GolemHouse) (GolemHouse)
description:
Treasure Tile is a hack’n’slash action RPG that takes place in a world completely made up of tiles. You are a tile, you fight other tiles and you earn tile treasure!

Move/attack - [WASD]
Inventory - [I]
Character Screen - [C]
Heal - [Q]

This is an early prototype - all feedback is welcome and appreciated.

If you want to know when we update the game, you can subscribe to our newsletter. And if you want to ask some questions or become an actual participant in these early stages of development, feel free to join our Discord channel. We also have a website if you're into that sort of thing.
